title: Mayo Clinic neurosurgeon reveals 8 back pain myths to stop believing
description: Back pain is wrapped in persistent myths, but many are far from the truth. From misconceptions about heavy lifting and bed rest to confusion over posture, exercise, and surgery, Dr. Meghan Murphy breaks down what really causes pain and what actually helps. Her insights reveal that everyday habits, movement, and smart prevention often make a bigger difference than people realize.
content: Back pain is wrapped in persistent myths, but many are far from the truth. Her insights reveal that everyday habits, movement, and smart prevention often make a bigger difference than people realize.
